events.title: Suspicious Group Chat Invitation

dialogues.text: I finally have no homework today. I can play for a while.
Let me check my phone for new messages.
(Zack scrolls his phone and sees a private message from someone unknown)
Only the brave can join. Recruiting new members to the [ISIS Blood Oath]. Follow true power.
ISIS Blood Oath? That name sounds kind of scary...
(He turns to look at Aether sitting in the corner)
Aether, I just got a strange invite to join something called the ISIS Blood Oath.
ISIS? I feel like I've heard that name before... Is it a group in a game?
It seems more than just a game... Let's check.
(Zack and Aether grab a tablet and search quickly)
Oh no, ISIS is a real terror group. They have done many terrible things.
Isn't this a prank group? Are these people really that bad?
It looks like this chat is run by their supporters.
But... should we go in and see? Maybe it's just an over-the-top name and there's nothing inside?
If we go in, we can see what they are doing and gather proof to report... But what if it's too awful?
I don't know either... It feels strange, but I'm curious what is inside.
(After hesitating, Zack clicks the link)
(Inside the chat, the screen fills with violent propaganda images and bloody video clips)
This... this is so disgusting!
(Zack immediately leaves the chat)
(Zack reports the chat. After review, the platform thanks him and gives a one-month plus experience)
(System message: Fans +20)
I will never click such things again... These images still haunt me.
This is too dangerous. It's safest to report it right away.
(Zack does not enter the chat and reports it)
(After review, the platform thanks him and gives a one-month plus experience)
(System message: Fans +20)
Well done. Staying away from such people is how I protect myself.

events.summary: Some dangers you don't need to see with your own eyes to confirm. When you find real crime or extreme violence, the best action is to stay away and report immediately. Not letting curiosity lead you is the start of protecting yourself.
